snippet: People submitted 927 proposals in an effort to update the definition of public relations for an age of social media and spin doctors.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes the Public Relations Society of America led effort to update the definition of public relations for an age of social media and spin doctors; notes winning definition was selected from 927 proposals submitted.
lead_paragraph: People submitted 927 proposals in an effort to update the definition of public relations for an age of social media and spin doctors.

headline.seo: Public Relations, a Topic That Is Tricky to Define
headline.main: Public Relations Defined, After an Energetic Public Discussion
headline.print_headline: Public Relations Defined, After an Energetic Public Discussion
